Hotel Description is Located 2 km from Nahargarh Fort and Jaipur Railway Station, Jaipur Inn faces a large lawn and offers a rooftop café. It features free parking and air-conditioned rooms with a cable TV.  The property is less than 3 km from City Palace, Ram Niwas Gardens, Jantar Mantar and Bapu Bazaar. Jaipur International Airport is 12 km away.  Fitted with tiled flooring and large windows, well-lit rooms offer a work desk and seating area. Private bathrooms come with hot/cold shower facilities.  Offering panoramic views of Jaipur City, the rooftop café serves both local and European dishes. A buffet dinner is also served every evening.  Guests can shop at the souvenir shop, or make travel arrangements at the tour desk. The 24-hour front desk assists with laundry and airport shuttle services.    Couples particularly like the location — they rated it 8.9 for a two-person trip.

name: Treebo Trip Tordi Haveli
description:
The name of the hotel is Treebo Trip Tordi Haveli. The id of the hotel is 64906aaea3f464b55600b959. The hotel star rating is 3. The hotel address is Plot- 32, Sector No. 6, Chitrakoot Scheme, Vaishali Nagar, Chitrakoot, 302021 Jaipur, India, 302021 Jaipur, India. Hotel Description is Treebo Tordi Haveli is a heritage property located in Sector 6 of Vaishalinagar, Jaipur. The hotel is situated in a prime location with easy access to popular landmarks, commercial hubs, shopping complexes, and restaurants. The property has an in-house restaurant named Kaliya N Korma which serves delicious North Indian and Chinese cuisine. Treebo Tordi Haveli provides a host of on-site amenities such as prompt and efficient room service, public washroom, full-stocked pantry, furnished lobby with air-conditioning, provision for ironing boards, third-party laundry service, cloakroom, and high-speed internet. The hotel also has an on-site parking facility which can accommodate 4 four-wheelers and 4 two-wheelers. The guests at Treebo Tordi Haveli are also served a complimentary breakfast buffet of delicious North Indian and South Indian cuisine. The property is well-connected to all the major transit points in Jaipur. Jaipur Junction which is the main railway station is 8.5 km away and Sindhi Camp Station is 9 km away from the hotel. For those who prefer travelling by air, Treebo Tordi Haveli is 13 km away from Jaipur International Airport. The hotel has an inventory of 13 Oak or Standard rooms which are spacious and well-lit. The rooms in Treebo Tordi Haveli are comfortable and styled with traditional furnishings. All the Oak rooms in the property are equipped with air-conditioning, TV with DTH or cable connection, intercom facility, windows for ventilation, coffee table, wardrobe, comfortable king size beds, and an electric kettle with provision for making tea or coffee. The attached washrooms in Treebo Tordi Haveli are equipped with a continuous supply of water, fresh towels, complimentary branded toiletries, and modern fixtures. Treebo Tordi Haveli has easy access to popular tourist attractions in Jaipur like Saroj Art Gallery, Akshardham Temple, Amber Palace, Chand Pol, Kanak Vrindavan Mahal, Panna Meena Ka Kund, Heritage, Water Walks, Step Well, Hawa Mahal, Sisodia Rani Ka Bagh, Tal Katora Lake, Vidyadhar Bagh, Gaitor ki Chhatriyan, and Jal Mahal. If you’re hungry you can head to the in-house restaurant or pick one of the popular restaurants in the area such as Kebab & Curries Company, TGIB - The Great Indian Buffet, La Salsa, Hadippa, Kesar Kanha, The Food Karma, Marky Momos, and Pizza Kulture. In case of a medical emergency, Global Heart & General Hospital and Asopa Hospital are located within a kilometre away from the hotel.

description:
The name of the hotel is Leisure Inn Grand Chanakya. The id of the hotel is 64906aaea3f464b55600b984. The hotel star rating is 4. Hotel Description is Leisure Inn Grand Chanakya is a contemporary 52-room hotel, located in the heart of the Jaipur city on M.I. Road, making this the ideal accommodation choice to explore the famous Pink City of India. Guests will be positioned within easy access to some of the city’s most popular tourist attractions like Hawa Mahal, City Palace, Amer Fort and local markets like Bapu Bazaar and Johari Bazaar. Major corporate hubs and convention centers are also in close proximity from the hotel. For guest enjoyment, we have a range of facilities onsite including a rooftop bar & grill, all day dining restaurant, a speciality pure vegetarian restaurant, banquet and conference rooms, business center, spa and gymnasium for those guests wishing to stick to their fitness regime.

Onsite meeting facilities including a boardroom with capacity up to 12 people, a Banquet Room (dividable) with a maximum capacity of 125 people, and a party room – an ideal venue for private gatherings with families and friends, which can hold up to 25 people.
Guests are spoilt for choice at Leisure Inn Grand Chanakya with an onsite restaurant, cafe and bar. Be sure to stop by when staying for your morning coffee, delicious meal or a relaxing drink to end the day. Room options include a Standard Room, Leisure Inn Room, and Grand Chanakya Suite featuring  a flat screen TV with 30+ channels, individually controlled air-conditioning, free Wi-Fi, work desk, phone with IDD access, in-room safe, mini-bar, tea and coffee making facilities, hair dryer, iron and ironing board, plush towelling and 24-hour room service.
 Additional Description for the hotel are Explore the Pink City of India from the heart of Jaipur.

name: Hotel Heritage inn
description: The name of the hotel is Hotel Heritage inn. The id of the hotel is 64906aafa3f464b55600b987. The hotel star rating is 3. The hotel address is D1, Kabir Marg, near Collectrate Circle, Subash Nagar, Sen Colony, Bani Park, Jaipur, Rajasthan 302006, 302006 Jaipur, Rajasthan. Hotel Description is Hotel Heritage Inn welcomes its guests to the Pink city of Jaipur. Offering a range of contemporary amenities and services coupled with gracious hospitality and classic accommodation, this hotel is sure to enchant the leisure travellers. It provides immaculate service to guest to make their stay memorable. Location: Hotel Heritage Inn is located at Kabir Marg. Some of the interesting places of tourist attraction include Sisodia Rani ka Bagh (Approx. 9km) and Gaitor (Approx. 6km). Located on the Jaipur-Amber road, Gaitor was designated as the royal cremation grounds of the mighty Kachhawa dynasty. The word is believed to be the mispronounced form of a Hindi phraseGaye ka Thor which means 'resting place of the departed souls'.The cenotaphs at Gaitore are a perfect combination of Hindu and Islamic architecture. Guests can also visit the Vidyadhar Garden, Shila Devi Temple and Lakkar Haveli during their stay at the hotel. Distance from Jaipur International Airport: Approx. 14kms Distance from Jaipur Railway Station: Approx. 3kms Hotel Features: Myriad of amenities and services are present for the guests to indulge in ultimate pleasure and comfort. Splendid location and classic ambiance make the stay worthwhile. Some of the amenities offered to the guests are room service, front desk, A/c, security and doctor on call. Itinerary needs of the guests are taken care by the travel desk. The conference hall can be availed for conducting board and team meetings. The beautiful in-house restaurant is a must visit for the guests. It features some beautiful arched windows and wall designs and offers traditional Rajasthani cuisine prepared by expert chefs. Rooms: Well-appointed and tastefully designed superior, suite and semi superior rooms are available for accommodation. Some of the common in-room amenities include TV, complimentary Wi-Fi access, writing desk, phone and bedside lamp. The spacious rooms also features open windows which lets in fresh air and sunlight. Additional Description for the hotel are Classic accommodation and impeccable service in the Pink city of Jaipur.

This 3-star hotel, which is in proximity to the bus stand, railway station and airport, ensures that travellers do not face any difficulty in finding accommodation during their visit to the Pink City. name: Court Shekha
description: The name of the hotel is Court Shekha. The id of the hotel is 64906ab8a3f464b55600ba23. The hotel star rating is 1. The hotel address is B-49/50, Prem Nagar, Khatipura Road, Jaipur, Rajasthan, 302012, India, 302012 Jaipur, Rajasthan, India. Hotel Description is The elaborate terrace, traditional rooms and traditional living room seem to whisper a single word: Shekhawati Home  Court Shekha acts as an emissary of a home conveying Rajasthan's rich heritage and culture. This elegant structure finds its inspiration in the rural village architecture of 'Shekhawati' , which is the home zone of the owners. This home indeed stands as a proud representative of all that its land is best known for: Royalty, Colour , a Robust culture and Heritage charm. We welcome you all to the capital city -JAIPUR of the most colorful state of India  Rajasthan .  PADHARO MHARE DESH' which when translated means 'welcome to my land' as We welcome you to stay with us and experience a new home and culture in a safe and culturally rich neighborhood whether you are on a business trip or on a holiday . We would try and provide you all the amenities in a homely and comfortable environment. Jaipur is both on business map and a major tourist destination being a part of the Golden Triangle .  We would invite you to savor and entice your taste buds with the traditional home cooked recipies,which are a speciality and novelty of the native village and Rajput clan to which the lady of the house belongs to. Hope to host you soon!!
address: B-49/50, Prem Nagar, Khatipura Road, Jaipur, Rajasthan, 302012, India, 302012 Jaipur, Rajasthan, India

Hotel Description is Treebo Trend Hotel New Rockwell is a 3-star property located in the heart of New Sanganer Road, Jaipur. This makes it well-connected, therefore, ideal for anyone visiting Jaipur. It is a budget-friendly property that provides guests with all the essential amenities. They also ensure sanitation under Treebo Hygiene Shield safety standards. Treebo Trend Hotel New Rockwell come with in-house amenities like a banquet hall that can accommodate a total of 200 persons, a bar and a restaurant that serves delicious food. However, they do not allow outside food. The hotel provides free WiFi which is ideal for a workation as well as a complimentary breakfast of North Indian and South Indian cuisines. Other amenities include a cloakroom, an elevator and third-party laundry services. It is a disabled-friendly property and has drivers quarters and a parking facility for 30 two-wheelers and 15 four-wheelers for those who drove to this place. The hotel also provides a private cab facility and a travel desk for any assistance. They come with a gorgeously furnished lobby that is air-conditioned and has a smoke alarm, a fully stocked pantry and a public washroom. The hotel provides prompt room service and round-the-clock security. Additionally, it is a couple-friendly property that accepts local IDs and wallet payments. The hotel has a total of 15 rooms that are categorised as Maple (Deluxe) and Mahogany (Premium). They come furnished with cosy king-sized beds, a wardrobe for your clothes and a sofa chair. They also have smoking rooms. Other amenities that the rooms come with are an intercom facility, T.V, A.C, fan and room lock. All ensuite bathrooms have provisions for hot water, a shower curtain and complimentary Treebo toiletries. Guests can go sightseeing to places like Central Park (5.3 km), Amar Jawan Jyoti (3.9 km), Jal Mahal (12.4 km), City Palace (6.4 km), Nahargarh Fort (8.5 km), Amber Palace (15.3 km) and Hawa Mahal (8 km). In case of emergencies, there are hospitals close by like Sanjeevani Hospital and Medical Research Institute (200 m) and Life Line Hospital (1.2 km).

name: Hilton Jaipur
description:
The name of the hotel is Hilton Jaipur. The id of the hotel is 64906ab8a3f464b55600ba50. The hotel star rating is 5. The hotel address is 42 Geejgarh House, Hawa Sadak, 42. Hotel Description is Set in the heart of the city, Hilton Jaipur is only 15 minutes' drive from popular tourist attractions like City Palace, Hawa Mahal, Albert Hall Museum, M.I. Road, Birla Mandir etc. Jaipur's central business district, numerous banks and government offices, and the Gopalpura and Vishwakarma industrial areas can all be easily reached from our magnificent hotel in Jaipur.

On a day trip to the nearby destinations such as Pushkar or Ajmer, one can also choose to travel using local trains. The city railway station is just eight minutes away and Jaipur Airport is only 20 minutes' drive from the hotel.

Combining elegance with comfort, our spacious guest rooms offer wonderful views of the city skyline and the Aravalli Hills. Enjoy amenities such as a 37-inch TV, Wi-Fi and a naturally lit bathroom with a rain shower. Four of our rooms boast a private 1000 sq. ft. terrace and our executive rooms and suites include Executive Lounge access. Sip signature cocktails in the inviting Krystal Bar before savoring international specialties in our award winning all-day dining restaurant, Aurum. Dine al fresco by the pool in our yet another highly awarded restaurant for Indian specialty, Chaandi, which serves the finest Indian cuisine.

Hilton Jaipur's 10,000 sq. ft. flexible function space includes a 21 ft. high ballroom, an open-air patio and two meeting rooms. This Jaipur hotel's central location, modern A/V facilities, creative menus and professional service makes it the ideal venue for exclusive meetings, celebrations and weddings.

All prices displayed are subject to Goods and Services Tax (GST) at prevailing rates “ 12% for transaction value of INR 1,001 or more but less than INR 7,500 and 18% for transaction value of INR 7,501 or more. The tax amount based on the prevailing rates will be added to the hotel bill and payable by guests. Additional Description for the hotel are Conveniently located, Hilton Jaipur offers spectacular city views and amenities like spacious rooms, multiple specialty restaurants, and flexible event spaces.

Hotel Kalyan is a first Class budget economy Hotel located in the heart of Historic Pink City Jaipur (Raj.)It is fully facility Hotel providing the domestic & International Travelers easy access to major tourist sites & Locally to bus station , Railway Station, Shopping Centres and Airport and JAIPUR is well connected with famous tourist places like Delhi, Jodhpur, Pushkar, Agra, Udaipur and Jaisalmer.

Jaipur capital of the state of Rajasthan and has grown over the years into an attractive tourist destination, reflects a unique ambience which derives from its happy blend of tradition and modernity.

Jaipur is better known as the Pink city, owing to the distinctive pink shade that covers its houses and walls. Jaipur is credited with being one of the well-planned cities, complete with majestic places, forts and temples.

We, as well our staff have created a friendly and courteous atmosphere that is truly special. We stand ready to serve the guests 24x7 and will provide all kind of information regarding places of interest in and around the city.

name: Kalyan Heritage
description:
The name of the hotel is Kalyan Heritage. The id of the hotel is 64906ab8a3f464b55600ba53. The hotel star rating is 3. The hotel address is 34/35 Swaroop Vihar Vistaar, Near SKIT College, Jagatpura.,  302017 Jaipur,  India, 302017 Jaipur, India. Hotel Description is ★ Experience the finest luxury heritage hotel in Jaipur – Kalyan Heritage and Paradise. Kalyan Heritage is a beautifully structured heritage hotel with unmatchable royal luxury hospitality. It is a captivating orchestration of simplicity, elegance and attention to detail, rooms showcase the finest modern craftsmanship, yet never leave their heritage behind. Just 3 kilometres from the airport our regal-influenced design and gardens echo the city’s history. The architecture of the hotel is such that you will find yourself reliving the ancient era. ★ Set amidst a calm and peaceful surroundings with breath-taking panoramic views from the rooms and the well maintained lush green garden and lawn, Kalyan Heritage and Paradise is an excellent choice for every type of traveller viz. couples, families, groups eager to savour and cherish the bygone era of staying in a traditional charming heritage hotel with all the modern amenities. A hotel in the city that leaves you satiated with ultimate comfort and unmatched style. It sets a benchmark for luxury. It will embrace you in a surrounding which is peaceful and quiet. ★ Kalyan Heritage and Paradise has always stood for an unparalleled experience in hosting weddings, special occasions, formal gatherings, meetings and conferences. Accommodations at Kalyan Heritage, are as delightful as the exterior. We’re proud to offer the best accommodations in the city with a host of comforts and services in settings that reflect the spirit of Rajasthan and its royalty. Walk from room to room amongst rich textures, opulent furnishings and exquisite objects d’art. It’s an architectural masterpiece that transcends time. Retreat to our rooms equipped with modern amenities. We also have marriage garden, banquet, conference room etc. with free wifi internet and power back up facility. The meeting rooms, banquet facilities and lawn can host events for 30 to 1500 guests. ★ Designed along the lines of traditional havelis, this leisure hotel in Jaipur has its own definition of space and splendour. Bring a group together for dinner at our rooftop restaurant that offer tastes from around the globe.
 Additional Description for the hotel are Experience the royal luxury of Kalyan Heritage, a captivating architectural masterpiece.

name: Sunrise Health Resort
description: The name of the hotel is Sunrise Health Resort. The id of the hotel is 64906ab9a3f464b55600ba66. The hotel star rating is 4. The hotel address is Village Sar (Bilochi),Delhi-Chandwaji-Ajmer Express Highway,Jaipur, Jaipur, Rajasthan, 302001, India, 302001 Jaipur, Rajasthan, India. Hotel Description is <b>Providing you with a wellness experience amid nature and luxury</b><br><br>Sunrise Health Resort, located on the Delhi-Jaipur-Ajmer Highway and surrounded by the tranquillizing Aravalli hills, is a perfect destination to unwind. The resort has a unique concept of blending nature s beauty with relaxation, making it an ideal spot to discover oneself. You can get back into fitness by naturopathy, a holistic treatment with a concept of health with recreation.<br><br>The resort offers an outdoor pool, well-equipped gym, Naturopathic Treatment centre and Ayurvedic Spa. There are conference and meeting halls of various capacities for business purposes. They also provide hot spring bath, Jacuzzi, steam, sauna bath at an additional cost. Other facilities are live music, yoga classes, tennis and badminton court, horse riding, water sports, a tour of local culture, airport transportation, concierge service, free parking and free Wi-Fi for the convenience of the guests. <br><br>Sunrise Health Resort features 40 luxurious green cottages and 16 Premium Aravalli suites. The rooms have stylish dcor with a view to the eye-pleasing Aravalli hills. Other amenities are minibar, television, tea coffee maker, hairdryer, safe box, laundry and 24-hour room service.<br><br>Padmini is a multi-cuisine restaurant with a wide range of healthy and tasty Rajasthani dishes. Muskan is a fine dining vegetarian restaurant. Ananda Dine is a traditional Rajasthani cuisine with an amazing ambience; here food is served in Rajasthani Bajot style and greeted with a turban. Amantran is a Gujarati traditional dining; it also offers a variety of cuisines like Indian, Chinese, Continental, and Thai.<br><br>Tourist attractions nearby are Kali Ghati temple (3 km), Baba Ramdev Temple (6 km) Samode Bagh (9 km), Nahargarh Biological Park (24 km), Ramsagar Lake (27 km) and Jaipur Safari (29 km).<br><br>Sunrise Health Resort is 34 km from Jaipur Railway Station and 48 km from Jaipur Airport.<br><br>Jaipur city centre is 36 km from the resort.<br><br><b>What people love the most about this property is its natural setting and rejuvenating experiences.<br><br>Book now and enjoy luxury with wellness at Sunrise Health Resort. Additional Description for the hotel are "Experience wellness amid nature and luxury at Sunrise Health Resort"

name: Aditya International
description:
The name of the hotel is Aditya International. The id of the hotel is 64906abfa3f464b55600baca. The hotel star rating is 3. The hotel address is BHAWANI SINGH ROAD, 2, . Hotel Description is This hotel is located at the heart of the Pink City at Bhawani Singh Road, C Scheme, Jaipur and offers close proximity to all the cultural, historical and shopping hubs of the city. The hotel is situated 2 km from railway station, 3 km from the central bus station and 8 km from the airport.

This budget hotel is in a very well maintained, neat and clean, less polluted and highly secure area in Jaipur. It is ideal for both business travellers and holidaymakers alike. Facilities on offer to guests at this air-conditioned establishment include a lobby area with a 24-hour reception, a hotel safe, a currency exchange facility, a travel desk and lift access. There is a terrace garden, a banquet and conference hall and a restaurant which offers delicious Indian, Mughlai and Chinese cuisine. Guests can also take advantage of the room and laundry services and there is parking available for those arriving by car.

The hotel offers well appointed, beautifully decorated, spacious rooms which are well equipped with modern amenities. All come with a private bathroom with a shower and hot and cold running water. They are equipped with a direct dial telephone, satellite TV and WLAN Internet access. The rooms are very well ventilated and a few offer regal sitting arrangements known as Deewan (a marble chaise longue) to make the stay comfortable for guests. Furthermore, tea and coffee making facilities and individually regulated air conditioning units are provided in all accommodation as standard. Additional Description for the hotel are Conveniently located budget hotel with clean rooms and delicious cuisine.

name: SaffronStays Jaipura Garh
description:
The name of the hotel is SaffronStays Jaipura Garh. The id of the hotel is 64906ac4a3f464b55600bb1a. The hotel star rating is 4. The hotel address is Sewapura, Off Chaksu – Phagi State Highway, 303901 Jaipur, India, 303901 Jaipur, India. Hotel Description is SaffronStays Jaipura Garh is 40 km from Jaipur City in Sewapura, off Tonk Road. This VFS Global Times Travel Award 2018 Winner and Govt of Rajasthan certified heritage home was built on land gifted by Maharaja Sawai Madho Singh I of Jaipur to Sardar Singh.
Jaipura Garh provides 3 different accomodations. Click here to explore Imperial Room and Royal Room.
If you are looking for a true Rajasthani experience but away from the touristy crowds, then these rooms in this beautiful Haveli is a perfect choice.
Reminiscent of the 1800s when it was built, this home has been restored to its former glory with painstaking efforts. Ancestral memorabilia, traditional artefacts and hand-drawn door ornamentation are a testament of rich heritage.
This is SaffronStays Jaipura Garh - Noble. 3 rooms of SaffronStays Jaipura Garh - Royal and 2 rooms of SaffronStays Jaipura Garh - Imperial are also located in the home. Making a total of 6 spacious rooms in this home that are antarmukhi (Facing the inner courtyard).
Though all rooms offer modern amenities, you will surely spend more time in the enormous manicured lawn, two courtyards and winding terrace.
Wake up to crisp, clear air and enjoy a hot breakfast under the Neem tree in the courtyard, gorge on authentic Rajasthani thali under the stars and savour hot kheer by the bonfire in the chilly weather.
We bet you’ll spend your nights on the starlit terrace with a hookah in your hands and stories that fill your heart.
You can opt for various activities including camel cart rides, pottery, kite flying and cultural dance programs, at an additional cost.
You can also combine a stay here with a trip to Jhalana Safari Park (40 minutes away) for leopard spotting or a day trip to Ajmer, Pushkar, Bhangarh, Abhaneri or Ranthambore.
 Additional Description for the hotel are Escape the tourist crowds for a true Rajasthani experience.
address: Sewapura, Off Chaksu – Phagi State Highway, 303901 Jaipur, India, 303901 Jaipur, India
room option 0: Jaipura Garh - Imperial - Tonk Road, Jaipur
room option 1: Jaipura Garh - Royal - Tonk Road, Jaipur

name: Pandya Niwas
description:
The name of the hotel is Pandya Niwas. The id of the hotel is 64906acea3f464b55600bbba. The hotel star rating is not known. The hotel address is Nahargarh Road, . Hotel Description is Boasting a terrace, Pandya Niwas is situated in Jaipur in the Rajasthan region, 1 km from City Palace and 1.2 km from Jantar Mantar, Jaipur. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and room service, along with free WiFi. Free private parking is available and the hotel also offers car hire for guests who want to explore the surrounding area.

All rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a minibar, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. The hotel features some units that have a safety deposit box, and the rooms are fitted with a private bathroom and a wardrobe. At Pandya Niwas each room is fitted with bed linen and towels.

Vegetarian and vegan breakfast options are available each morning at the accommodation.

Hawa Mahal - Palace of Winds is 1.4 km from Pandya Niwas, while Jaipur Railway Station is 4.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Jaipur International, 15 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Tara Niwas
description:
The name of the hotel is Tara Niwas. The id of the hotel is 64906acea3f464b55600bbc1. The hotel star rating is 3. The hotel address is B-22/B, Behind Chandni Craft, Shiv Marg, Bani Park, Bani Park, 302016 Jaipur, India, 302016 Jaipur, India. Hotel Description is Surrounded by gardens in peaceful Bani Park, this boutique hotel offers a café and value-for-money accommodation. It is a 5-minute drive from Jaipur Railway Station and the central bus station. Located in downtown Jaipur, Tara Niwas is about 3 km from Albert Hall Museum and a 30-minute drive from Sanganer Airport. Featuring a blend of traditional and modern décor, rooms at Tara Niwas offer air conditioning and heating. Equipped with a TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box, each room comes with either bath or shower facilities. The hotel’s business centre offers Wi-Fi access. Guests can relax by the terrace, head to the games room or have a quiet read in the library. Services offered include tour arrangement and a ticketing service. Tara Niwas’ café serves á la carte home-cooked local and European vegetarian dishes. In-room dining is also offered. Bani Park is a great choice for travellers interested in architecture, ancient landmarks and sightseeing. This property also has one of the best-rated locations in Jaipur! Guests are happier about it compared to other properties in the area. Couples particularly like the location — they rated it 8.1 for a two-person trip. This property is also rated for the best value in Jaipur! Guests are getting more for their money when compared to other properties in this city.
 Additional Description for the hotel are Value-for-money accommodation in peaceful Bani Park with café, garden, and friendly service.

name: Bara Bungalow Kalwar, Rosakue Collection
description:
The name of the hotel is Bara Bungalow Kalwar, Rosakue Collection. The id of the hotel is 64906acea3f464b55600bbcd. The hotel star rating is 4. The hotel address is Village and Post Office Kalwar, Jaipur, Rajasthan, 303706, India, 303706 Jaipur, Rajasthan, India. Hotel Description is Jaipur in Rajasthan has always maintained a rich heritage throughout the pages of history. The times may have changed, but the legendary 'Pink City' continues to maintain a balance between modern trend and cultural traditions. At Bara Bungalow Kalwar, Jaipur, we have maintained this philosophy to provide all guests with an enchanting experience during their stay in Jaipur. 

Built, in the year 1879, by Thakur Balwant Singh, Kalwar is a small village on the outskirts of Jaipur city. Bara Bungalow, Kalwar provides very soothing and tranquil surroundings and rises from the foot of a hill that dominates the backdrop of the hotel. The majestic exteriors are complemented by the resplendent interiors of our Jaipur hotel. Located almost 35 kilometres from the Jaipur International Airport, Bara Bungalow Kalwar is an ideal weekend getaway from Delhi NCR. 

Bara Bungalow portrays the cultural heritage of Rajasthan and is reminiscent of the bygone era. Ornate designs with intricate craftsmanship have gone into making this palace hotel in Kalwar one of the best in Rajasthan. Gaze upon the peacocks dancing in the morning, pigeons feeding or a pair of kingfishers strolling in the garden. Come and experience all at Bara Bungalow, Kalwar. Vast open spaces, lush green gardens, a pleasant aesthetic view - all reflect the splendour of the majestic palaces of Rajasthan and add a regal touch to the elegance of Bara Bungalow.

Indulge in the rich flavours of the local Rajasthani cuisine when you head to The Dining Room at Bara Bungalow Kalwar, Jaipur. The rich aroma of delectable dishes wafting through the air is complemented with a subtle ambience and trendy decor.

Bara Bungalow offers three exquisite room categories - Superior Room, Heritage Room and Rajputana Suites, each of which have been crafted in the traditional Rajasthani style. Spacious, vibrant and artistic, these rooms at our hotel near Jaipur are sure to make your stay a memorable one. Additional Description for the hotel are Experience the majesty of Rajasthan's heritage in tranquil surroundings.
address: Village and Post Office Kalwar, Jaipur, Rajasthan, 303706, India, 303706 Jaipur, Rajasthan, India

Hotel Description is Close to the historic Amber fort is " Khas Bagh " a farm retreat tucked away in the Aravali hills. A stone's throw from the 12th century Amer Fort, Khas Bagh is built on the lines of a medieval style haveli with open courtyards, verandahs with arches and intricately carved stone pillars and jaalis, all hand-crafted by local craftsmen. Twenty five luxuriously appointed rooms/suites with antique furniture, a polo lounge with black and white family photographs, magnificient sandstone pool, sprawling lawns & verandahs overlooking the hills, all add to providing an authentic bespoke Rajput stately home-stay experience
 Additional Description for the hotel are Experience authentic Rajput stately home-stay with medieval haveli architecture, luxurious rooms, and magnificent sandstone pool.

The Vesta Maurya Palace reflects the city's spirit in a beautiful blend of tradition and contemporary sophistication. It is the preferred hotel choice of discerning business travellers and tourists.

name: Comfort Inn Hawa Mahal
description:
The name of the hotel is Comfort Inn Hawa Mahal. The id of the hotel is 64906ad2a3f464b55600bc3d. The hotel star rating is 3. The hotel address is CIVIL LINES, AJMER ROAD, . Hotel Description is This hotel enjoys an ideal location with easy reach of nearby bus and railway stations. It also offers easy access to the several tourist attractions in the city: the colourful bazaars and the ancient palaces of this famed Pink City are all within a few minutes' drive. The Birla Mandir Temple and the Fort of Victory (Jaigarh), a rugged fortress built in 1726, the City Palace, the Moon Place (Sawai Jai Singh's Chandra Mahal) are all nearby the hotel. The airport is approximately 11 km away and it takes about 40 minutes to reach the hotel, from the airport, depending on traffic conditions.

This central city hotel comprises a total of 35 well-appointed air-conditioned rooms spread over 3 floors. The friendly hotel staff offers all the necessary assistance and ensures guests' stay will be a memorable one. The relaxing informality of the interiors of the hotel blend with subtle elegance to create the right mood for a most enjoyable stay. Facilities on offer to guests at this air-conditioned establishment include a lobby area with a 24-hour reception, a hotel safe, a currency exchange facility, a cloakroom and lift access. It also offers a bar, a restaurant, conference facilities and Internet access (charges apply). Guests may also take advantage of the room and laundry services for an additional fee and there is a car park for those arriving by car.

The hotel offers tastefully decorated guest rooms with en suite bathrooms. All modern conveniences are also provided, such as a hairdryer, a direct dial facility, cable TV and a minibar. They are also equipped with a tea and coffee maker, carpeting, individually adjustable air conditioning, a safe and wifi Internet access. The front-facing rooms all feature a balcony.

The hotel offers guests the in-house Rangoli multi-cuisine restaurant, the Raj Bagh garden restaurant and the Scarlet bar. Additional Description for the hotel are Convenient location, easy access to attractions, and comfortable rooms.
address: CIVIL LINES, AJMER ROAD,

Hotel Description is Hotel Jaipur Central, Jaipur, located in Jaipur city center, is a popular choice for travelers. With its convenient location, the hotel offers easy access to the city's must-see destinations.
Enjoy all that Hotel Jaipur Central, Jaipur has to offer! Free internet access provided within the hotel keeps you connected throughout your stay. For guests arriving by car, parking is provided free of charge. Always get the assistance you need with front desk services including concierge service, express check-in or check-out, luggage storage and safety deposit boxes.
For longer stays or whenever you need it, the dry cleaning service and laundry service keep your favorite travel outfits clean and available. Feel like doing nothing? Available services like 24-hour room service, room service and daily housekeeping let you get the most out of your time at the Hotel Jaipur Central, Jaipur. All your minor, last-minute needs can be taken care of by the convenience stores without having to go anywhere. For health reasons, smoking is not permitted anywhere inside the hotel.
For guests who would like to smoke, the designated smoking areas are available.
All guestrooms at Hotel Jaipur Central, Jaipur provide guests with a range of amenities to ensure a restful night. Enjoy your stay even more at the hotel, knowing that some selected rooms include linen service and air conditioning. For a bit of entertainment, guests will find daily newspaper, television and cable TV available in some selected rooms. Don't worry about being thirsty as a refrigerator, a coffee or tea maker, bottled water and mini bar are provided in some guestrooms.
Bathroom amenities are just as important as others, and at the hotel you'll find a hair dryer, toiletries and towels available in some guest bathrooms.

name: Savista Retreat
description:
The name of the hotel is Savista Retreat. The id of the hotel is 64906ad3a3f464b55600bc59. The hotel star rating is not known. The hotel address is Village Sanjharia P.O. Thikaria Ajmer Road Jaipur Jaipur, . Hotel Description is Nestled in the peaceful countryside at the edge of Jaipur city the eco-friendly boutique heritage Savista Retreat is housed in a grand private mansion. It boasts an outdoor pool, sun terrace and a wellness centre with yoga lessons.

The boutique Savista Retreat is about 22 km from Jaipur Airport and 45 km from Amber Fort. Guests who drive enjoy free parking privileges.

Decorated in soothing shades of red, yellow and green, the air-conditioned guestrooms at Savista feature handcrafted furnishings and private balconies.

Guests may take part in guided cross-country hikes, birdwatching and camel cart rides through the surrounding villages. Activities like hand block printing workshops, biking, yoga and cooking lessons can also be taken. For leisure, Savista Retreat also provides table tennis, a film viewing theatre and a quiet library.

Using organically grown local ingredients, the hotels restaurant serves North and South Indian dishes in a simple, home-cooked style. Other dining options include al fresco breakfast served in the gardens, snacks by the pool or drinks at the bar. Please inform Savista Retreat in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
Payment before arrival via bank transfer is required. The property will contact you after you book to provide instructions.

Hotel Description is Holiday Inn Jaipur City Centre is located in the Pink City of India just few minutes’ drive to Railway Station and Jaipur International Airport. It has easy access to popular tourist attractions like Hawa Mahal, Jantar Mantar, Amber Fort, Nahargarh Fort, City Palace, Jal Mahal and Albert Hall. The spacious and elegant rooms and suites at Holiday Inn Jaipur are complete with modern touches &advance amenities for a memorable stay experience. With three dining outlets, guests can choose to indulge in a buffet or a la carte options. Treat yourself to Continental, Indian and Rajasthani Royal cuisine at Monarch or dip into our Asian delicacies with a glass of wine at The Chao. Sit back and relax after a long day at The Roadhouse Bar &Grill, get a premium feel of royal lounge at Ten Kings with a variety of snacks and beverages to choose from. The hotel’s 30000 sq. ft. Viceroy and The Chancellor banquet space and the Kingston Lawn can accommodate up to 1800 guests for large weddings to social &corporate parties and conferences to business meetings &exhibitions. The property is 3 km from Hawa Mahal and City Mahal and 10 km from Amer Fort. It is 1 km from Jaipur Bus Station and Jaipur Railway Station. The Jaipur Airport is 15 km.

Rooms here will provide you with a flat-screen TV, air conditioning and a minibar. There is also an electric kettle. Featuring a shower, private bathrooms also come with a bath and free toiletries. You can enjoy a garden view from all the rooms. Extras include a seating area and satellite channels.

At Radoli House you will find a 24-hour front desk, a garden and BBQ facilities. Other facilities offered include meeting facilities, a games room and a tour desk. Car rental and currency exchange can be arranged.

Guests can enjoy local, Indian, Chinese, Italian and Continental cuisines from The Radoli House Lounge. A coffee shop serves piping hot beverages. Room service is available. City Palace was built during the reign of Maharaja Sawai Jai Singh. It has a museum, a Maharani's Palace, audience halls, pavilions and many other important buildings within the same complex. Other destinations such as Sheesh Mahal, Akshardham Temple and Hawa Mahal are worth- visiting. Distance from Jaipur International Airport: Approx. 14kms Distance from Railway Station Jaipur Junction: Approx. 3kms Hotel Features: Relaxation and rest are the main focus points of this hotel. Rooms: Deluxe rooms and suite rooms are the accommodation options at the hotel. Each room is artistically decorated and adorned with ethnic wooden furnishings. name: Castle Kanota
description:
The name of the hotel is Castle Kanota. The id of the hotel is 64906ad8a3f464b55600bc77. The hotel star rating is 3. The hotel address is Village post Kanota, agra Highway, 303012 Kānota, India, 303012, India. Hotel Description is Rajasthan, the land of Maharajas & famous for its castles, forts, and palaces is truly the colorful Jewel of India. Castle Kanota is one of the finest heritage hotels Near Jaipur, Rajasthan, providing a good example of history amalgamating with modern times. Spread over 19 Bighas (8 Acres) of land, Castle Kanota is truly a magnificent experience and can be a reason for visiting Jaipur. Built-in 1872 by the then Thakur of Kanota, Zorawar Singh Ji, who was also a cabinet minister in the government of Jaipur, the castle is located just 15 km. east of Jaipur on the Jaipur-Agra Highway.

With a built-in museum and a library which displays gold work and a unique collection of rare books, the castle takes you back to the grandeur of the past. There might be various heritage hotels in and around Jaipur but one of the best heritage hotels Near Jaipur, Rajasthan is Castle Kanota - with lots of unique qualities and alive signs of rural tourism.
 Additional Description for the hotel are Experience the grandeur of Rajasthan in a historic castle hotel.
address: Village post Kanota, agra Highway, 303012 Kānota, India, 303012, India

name: Clarks Inn
description:
The name of the hotel is Clarks Inn. The id of the hotel is 64906ad8a3f464b55600bc85. The hotel star rating is 3. The hotel address is D-55-A, Madho Singh Rd, Bani Park, Jaipur, Rajasthan, 302016, India, 302016 Jaipur, Rajasthan, India. Hotel Description is Clarks Inn is a 3-star accommodation in Jaipur. The property has spacious and well-appointed rooms which comes with air-conditioner, complimentary high-speed WiFi,  flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a telephone, closet, mini-bar, tea/coffee maker, work desk, electronic safe and attached bathroom with essential toiletries. Moreover, business class of this hotel features LAN cable at work desk and complimentary use of boardroom for two hour depending on availability. Guests can satiate their hunger at the in-house restaurant or enjoy their favorite drink at the bar.  Among other facilities, the hotel has a fitness center, rooftop pool, Bodhi spa including meeting and conference halls for guests on business trips.   

Taking a stroll at Cubbon Park, Lal Bagh botanical garden or Ulsoor Lake, catching your favourite movie at a multiplex, paying obeisance at  Shree Dodda Ganapati Temple or ISKCON temple are some of the things to do in Jaipur. Whether its the trendy malls or roadside stalls, shopping in Jaipur is a pleasant experience with choices like M.G Road, Commercial street and Koramangala. While summers are too hot and monsoons not favourable for sightseeing, the best time to visit Jaipur is from October to March. 

Some of the sightseeing places to visit in Jaipur are Vidhana Soudha, Bannerghatta Botanical Park, Sri Chamarajendra Park, Tipu Sultans Summer Palace, Lumbini gardens, Bull Temple road. Guests can also visit HAL heritage centre and Aerospace museum, Wonderla amusement park, Bangalore Fort, Innovative film city, Snow city, Bangalore Aquarium, Karnataka Chitrakala Parishath, M Chinnaswamy temple, Venkatappa Art gallery, Devanahalli Fort, Hulimavu Cave temple. Additional Description for the hotel are Spacious rooms, complimentary WiFi, rooftop pool, and in-house restaurant.

name: Devi Ratn Jaipur IHCL SeleQtions
description:
The name of the hotel is Devi Ratn Jaipur IHCL SeleQtions. The id of the hotel is 64906ad8a3f464b55600bc8a. The hotel star rating is 5. The hotel address is 8 and 9 Ballupura Farms Village Jamdoli Agra Road. Hotel Description is Devi Ratn is located at the picturesque location besides the Aravali mountain range. Jaipur International Airport is 45 minutes away and Jaipur Railway Station is 30 minutes away by car. The hotel is within 15 minutes reach of the old wall city.Devi Ratn is located at the picturesque location besides the Aravali mountain range. Jaipur International Airport is 45 minutes away and Jaipur Railway Station is 30 minutes away by car. The hotel is within 15 minutes reach of the old wall city. The hotel comprising 60 rooms and suites and 3 villas each equipped with modern amenities are a celebration of textures patterns latticework and color. Planned along crescent shaped streets at varying heights each suite promises a view of the Aravalli Hills.
It is a modern boutique hotel spa destination and event facility inspired by the areas color vibrance and cultural splendor. Jantar Mantar the Royal Observatory of Jaipur built in 1728 influenced the luxury resorts geometric shapes and structures while the regions famous gem craft is reflected in its materials and intricate details. Each suite is styled in one of Jaipurs famous jewel colors of fuchsia emerald green or blue sapphire. Each villa is surrounded by latticework that forms a jewel box like courtyard that. Food and Beverage includes an All Day Dining restaurant and one bar on lobby level. Swimming pool is located in the middle of the palace sporting enviable views of Aravali mountain range. With an enviable blend of options Devi Ratn promises to be a Dining Destination. Tajness A Commitment Restrengthened is a mark of assurance of IHCLs authentic Indian hospitality with an added comfort of safety hygiene and physical distancing. Additional Description for the hotel are Stunning views of Aravali mountains, modern luxury with vibrant colors.
address: 8 and 9 Ballupura Farms Village Jamdoli Agra Road

Hotel Description is <b>Get pampered in luxury within the finest ambience in Jaipur</b><br><br>Located strategically at Village Fathepura Bansa, in Jaipur, Samode Bagh is a luxury heritage hotel. It is situated about 1.5 km from Chandpole Bazar and 15 km from NIMS University. This once private retreat of Samode royal family is today a 5-star property. It has a palatial marble facade in 20 acres of manicured land and Mughal styled gardens and fountains. <br><br>The hotel is equipped with a sparkling swimming pool, meditation, yoga room and a spa. The banquet halls and lawns are open for lavish royal weddings and themed evening parties. Guests can enjoy nature walks and camel rides here. Free Wi-Fi is available for the convenience of guests. Other facilities include a travel desk and doctor-on-call service.<br><br>The air-conditioned rooms are equipped with amenities like a television, tea/coffee maker, minibar, electronic safe, and Wi-Fi. Guests can enjoy in-room services like newspaper, room service, laundry, hairdryer, and bathrobe  bath slippers.<br><br>The property has an in-house traditional restaurant that pampers your taste buds with authentic Indian and multi-cuisine food.<br><br>The Jaipur Airport is about 59 km from the property. The Jaipur Railway Station is 47 km away and the Jaipur Bus Stand is 47 km away from here.<br><br>Chandpole Bazar is located 1.5 km from the property. NIMS University is 15 km from the property, while City Palace is 45 km away from here. Other landmarks include Hawa Mahal (45 km).<br><br><b>Book now and enjoy world class services at Samode Bagh<br><br>What people love the most about this property is its great location and classy ambience. Additional Description for the hotel are Luxury heritage hotel with palatial marble facade and Mughal styled gardens.

name: Treebo Trend Bliss Raja Park
description:
The name of the hotel is Treebo Trend Bliss Raja Park. The id of the hotel is 64906ad8a3f464b55600bcc9. The hotel star rating is 3. The hotel address is 289, Lane No. 6, Vaishno Devi Marg, Panchwati Circle, Raja Park, 302004 Jaipur, India, 302004 Jaipur, India. Hotel Description is Centrally located on Vaishno Devi Marg in Raja Park, Treebo Trend Bliss is the perfect hotel for travellers visiting Jaipur on a budget. This modern property has an inventory of 17 rooms that are adequately furnished. These rooms are categorised into 2 Acacia (single) and 15 Oak (standard) rooms. Each room comes equipped with a television with DTH or cable connection, an air conditioner, intercom, wardrobe, mosquito repellent, fan, and a spotless private bathroom with running hot and cold water. A few rooms also come with a luggage shelf, sofa chair, and large windows to bring in plenty of natural light. Guests who stay at Treebo Trend Bliss can expect a host of on-site amenities, including prompt room service, laundry service (third party), an elevator, a public washroom, a furnished lobby, a stocked pantry, drivers’ quarters, and a cloakroom. The hotel also offers free parking for 10 two wheelers and 15 four wheelers and round-the-clock security. You can also enjoy a delicious buffet breakfast with a choice of North Indian and South Indian items in the hotel’s restaurant. You also have access to the hotel’s WiFi connection and will receive free branded toiletries. The hotel boasts an in-house restaurant called Bistro that serves Continental, Chinese, and North Indian cuisines in only vegetarian fares. The restaurant offers all the in-house guests a discount of 10% on the food. They also have an à-la-carte menu that allows you to order what you please from the comfort of your room. In addition to all this, the hotel also has three banquet halls that guests can rent for special occasions. The halls are named Benigen, Blossom and Boon and can accommodate 50, 170 and 170 guests, respectively. Getting to the hotel is relatively simple. The Jaipur International Airport is about 10.7 km from the hotel, if you’re taking a flight to the city. If you’re catching a train or bus, the Jaipur Junction is 6.6 km away, while the closest intercity bus station, Sindhi Camp, is 7 km away. Treebo Trend Bliss is located close to some of Jaipur’s most magnificent attractions. A few of the most popular ones to visit are Birla Mandir, Albert Hall Museum, Moti Dungri Ganesh Temple, Dolls Museum, the City Palace, Jantar Mantar and so much more. If you’re in the city on business, the hotel is located close to the corporate offices of Apollo Tyres, Jumbo Fincorp, Castrol, and Indian Oil Corporation Limited. For a bit of shopping and entertainment head to malls like Pink Square and City Pulse. If you prefer good old street shopping head to Lanes 2 and 3 of Raja Park. In case you’ve forgotten something essential, head to Reliance Fresh. If you’re ever in need of medical assistance, rush to the Holy Family Hospital or Mahatma Gandhi Hospital. For a quick bite hearty meal, you can visit restaurants like Kabab and Curry, Swami Cafe, Tulsi, Seb’s Restaurant, Trio Restaurant and Cafeteria, and Game of Taste.
 Additional Description for the hotel are Centrally located budget hotel with restaurant, free parking, and banquet halls.

name: Fort Chandragupt
description:
The name of the hotel is Fort Chandragupt. The id of the hotel is 64906adea3f464b55600bcf0. The hotel star rating is 3. The hotel address is Station Rd,  Near Near Central Bus Stand,  Kanti Nagar,  Sindhi Camp,  Jaipur,  Rajasthan 302001, 302001 Jaipur, Rajasthan. Hotel Description is Fort Chandragupt is a centrally air conditioned heritage hotel with a 92 room inventory located in the centre of the city. The property and the room structure design has been blended in classic heritage with contemporary elegance. In a city where heritage buildings routinely are small in size the Fort Chandragupt Hotel is nothing small less than a high rise tower with multiple domes, arches and five floors. The hotel provides modern facilities and luxury accommodation at budget tariff.

With a roof top terrace of 8000 sq.ft which provides a commanding view of the aravalli range of mountains on top of which sits the city's most famous landmark the Nahargarh Fort and the view of the city on the other side. Also on the hotel terrace stand a group of domes one of the largest of their kind in Jaipur which add drama to the property's peaceful setting.
 Additional Description for the hotel are Centrally air conditioned heritage hotel with classic design and rooftop terrace with stunning city and mountain view

name: Treebo Trend Natraj Jaipur
description:
The name of the hotel is Treebo Trend Natraj Jaipur. The id of the hotel is 64906adea3f464b55600bd07. The hotel star rating is 3. The hotel address is Motilal Atal Road, Near Polo Victory, 302001 Jaipur, India, 302001 Jaipur, India. Hotel Description is Located in the historic city of Jaipur, Treebo Trend Natraj is a modern hotel on Motilal Atal Road that’s perfect for families, foreigners, corporates, couples, and solo travellers. This comfortable hotel boasts 30 well-furnished rooms, along with a host of amenities and services to keep you pampered during your vacation. The hotel offers a host of on-site amenities, including a cloakroom, an elevator, an ironing board, a furnished lobby, stocked pantry, quick room service, 24-hour security, quick laundry service and the provision for a private cab against a feasible charge. If you’re looking to host an event at the property, you can do so in the hotel’s 450 sq. ft. banquet hall, called ‘Navigator’, which can comfortably accommodate 30 guests. The rooms are categorised into 6 Acacia (Single), 15 Oak (Standard), 5 Maple (Deluxe) and 4 Mahogany (Premium) units. You can expect in-room amenities like an air conditioner, wardrobe, luggage shelf, sofa chair, Locker, study table and chair, coffee table, an intercom, mosquito repellant, television with DTH or cable connection, and an attached bathroom with a shower curtain. In addition to this, guests can request a heater in the colder months and a few rooms also come with a balcony and mini-fridge. Guests can also make use of the standard Treebo offerings of free WiFi, branded toiletries and a complimentary breakfast. When you’re hungry, you can visit the hotel’s in-house restaurant, Topaz that serves delicious North Indian and Chinese dishes in vegetarian fares only. You can enjoy a complimentary buffet breakfast in the restaurant and choose from a large spread of North Indian and South Indian dishes. The restaurant also has an extensive à-la-carte menu that allows you to order food from the comfort of your room. In terms of getting to the hotel, the Jaipur International Airport is 13 km away if you’re travelling to the city by flight. If you’re catching a train or bus to the city, Jaipur Junction is only 1.1km away from the hotel and the Sindhi Camp Bus Station is only 700m away from the hotel. Treebo Trend Natraj is close to several major attractions in the city. You can start your sightseeing by visiting Albert Hall Museum, City Palace, Hawa Mahal, Jantar Mantar, and Dolls Museum. If you’re in Jaipur for work, corporate offices like SBI Bank, Overseas Bank of India, and Central Bank of India are in proximity of the hotel. For all your shopping needs, you can head to Vishal Mega Mart or Ganapati Plaza. Shop for traditional mojaris, jewellery, clothing, and handicrafts at traditional markets like Bapu Bazaar, Johari Bazaar, Nehru Bazaar and MI Road. In case you’re in need of medical attention, you can head to Maxwell Hospital, SMS Hospital, and Asian Hospital. If you’re looking to try more local food, head to restaurants like Talk of the Town, Gulabi Nagari, Khandelwal Dhaba, and the Forresta.
 Additional Description for the hotel are Convenient location, comfortable rooms, and excellent service make it ideal.
address: Motilal Atal Road, Near Polo Victory, 302001 Jaipur, India, 302001 Jaipur, India

name: Hotel Narain Niwas Palace
description:
The name of the hotel is Hotel Narain Niwas Palace. The id of the hotel is 64906adfa3f464b55600bd19. The hotel star rating is 4. The hotel address is Kanota Bagh, Narain Singh Road, Jaipur - 302 004, Rajasthan, INDIA, 302004 Jaipur, India, 302004 Jaipur, Rajasthan, India. Hotel Description is The land of kings and palaces – Rajasthan – echoes tales of India's glorious past, the dynasties that ruled and their exploits at the war fields. These legends of time are brought back to life by royal heritage hotels. Standing grand amidst modern day Jaipur is Hotel Narain Niwas Palace, whose crest reads – “Brave deeds live, though bodies die”. Traditionally, ‘Niwas’ means a home of the royals.

Hotel Narain Niwas Palace is one of the finest heritage hotels of the princely state of Rajasthan, showcasing a good example of history amalgamating with modern times. Centrally located in Jaipur, the Pink City of India, the palace was built in the year 1928 by General Amar Singh Ji, the then Thakur of Kanota. Designed in the Anglo-Indian style popular in the victorian era, the palace, which served as the country resort for the Kanota royalty, is now one of the best heritage hotels one can witness in present times. Decorated with ethnic Indian furnishings, coupled with Rajput flourishing and traditional Jaipur-style painted wall decor in a typically bold color palette, Hotel Narain Niwas Palace provides an exclusive retreat to its guests.
 Additional Description for the hotel are Experience Rajasthan's glorious past in a grand heritage hotel.
address: Kanota Bagh, Narain Singh Road, Jaipur - 302 004, Rajasthan, INDIA, 302004 Jaipur, India, 302004 Jaipur, Rajasthan, India

name: Shahpura House
description:
The name of the hotel is Shahpura House. The id of the hotel is 64906adfa3f464b55600bd23. The hotel star rating is 4. The hotel address is D 257 Devi Marg Bani Park,  Bani Park,  302016 Jaipur,  India, 302016 Jaipur, India. Hotel Description is Featuring traditional Rajput architect, a mixture of Mughal and Indian, a facade with domes and frescoes, Shahpura House is also home to the ruling royal family. The hotel has a large pool, spa and wellness centre and unique accommodation with free WiFi.  Shahpura House’s charming 65 rooms and Suites are luxuriously furnished. Bathrooms come with a bathtub and a shower, while rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV and a minibar. Each room is decorated with marble and semi-precious stones.  Guests can enjoy an authentic Rajasthan meal and a refreshing beverage at Rang Mahal Restaurant. Great views of Amber Fort and Aravali Hills accompany meals. The restaurant also has an international menu. The property also houses a rooftop and a poolside restaurant. Guests can enjoy a variety of beverages at the Bar.  Recreational facilities include a game room, horse riding and a tour desk, which organises excursions to local attractions.
 Additional Description for the hotel are "Stay in Shahpura House for a luxurious royal experience with stunning views."

name: Naila Bagh Palace
description: The name of the hotel is Naila Bagh Palace. The id of the hotel is 64906ae3a3f464b55600bd4e. The hotel star rating is 3. The hotel address is Moti Doongri Road, Gangawal Park, Adarsh Nagar, Jaipur, Jaipur, Rajasthan, 302004, India, 302004 Jaipur, Rajasthan, India. Hotel Description is Naila Bagh Palace is a heritage hotel, standing tall and wide on Moti Doongari Road. Built in the 19th century, the palace still retains the old-world charm. It is environed by gardens and courtyards, and is adorned with ornate frescos, colonial furniture and splendid portraits of the royal family. It is an important landmark in the town, admired for its awe-inspiring architecture and splendid interiors./n/nA 3-star property, Naila Bagh Palace offers rooms in Heritage Standard Room, Heritage Deluxe Room, Heritage Royal Room and Heritage Maharaja Suite categories. Designed in an exquisite manner, the rooms have all the facilities that guests look for a royal stay. Besides round-the-clock room service, the palace provides housekeeping, laundry, currency exchange and various other facilities for an added comfort. /n/nThe palace organises puppet shows, village tours and camel safari to introduce guests to the culture of Jaipur.  Further, it offers herbal massage and helps in planning itinerary to assure pleasurable stay of guests. During their free time, guests can play billiards or take a dip into the open-air swimming pool. They can also request the hotel to organise theme based events and cooking workshops. Additional Description for the hotel are Experience royal luxury in a heritage palace with captivating architecture.
address: Moti Doongri Road, Gangawal Park, Adarsh Nagar, Jaipur, Jaipur, Rajasthan, 302004, India, 302004 Jaipur, Rajasthan, India

name: Jai Mahal Palace Jaipur
description:
The name of the hotel is Jai Mahal Palace Jaipur. The id of the hotel is 64906ae4a3f464b55600bd69. The hotel star rating is 5. The hotel address is Jacob Road Civil Lines .. Hotel Description is Located close to the main shopping centre and historical monuments Jai Mahal Palace is ideal for exploring the fascinating city of Jaipur The Palace is located 14 Kms from the Airport and 1 5 Kms from the Railway StationBuilt in 1745 the Jai Mahal Palace is a stunning piece of Rajasthans heritage a great example of Indo Saracenic architecture set amidst 18 acres of landscaped Mughal gardens Jai Mahal Palace has been the residence of three Prime Ministers of the princely state of Jaipur Painstakingly restored and recently refurbished it is now a luxury five star Taj heritage hotel equipped with all modern day comforts The 94 rooms and six suites offer you unbeatable views of the city and palace gardens
Perfectly located downtown in the heart of the Pink City in Civil Lines you are close to the main shopping areas and prime historical sites such as Amber Fort Hawa Mahal and City Palace The Jaipur International Airport is a mere 30 minutes away
Nestled within the luxurious ambience of the palace are several signature experiences aimed at pampering you Enjoy Bajot Private Dining a truly regal and romantic dinner Unwind with rejuvenating treatments and therapies at our spa or centre mind and body with yoga and meditation
Explore the palace history and its landscaped gardens to host fairy tale wedding celebrations for up to 2500 guests at the Palace Lawns Entertain business clients and hold important meetings at the palace boardrooms Silver Oak and Sterling and banquet hall Hendley Our concierge would be happy to arrange a city tour for your group and all else your heart desires
Come live like royalty at this heritage hotel Additional Description for the hotel are Explore the Pink City from this luxurious heritage hotel, surrounded by beautiful gardens and offering unbeatable city views.
address: Jacob Road Civil Lines .

name: Lal Mahal Palace
description:
The name of the hotel is Lal Mahal Palace. The id of the hotel is 64906ae4a3f464b55600bd71. The hotel star rating is not known. The hotel address is JAMWA RAMGARH,, . Hotel Description is This hotel lies in Jamwa Ramgarh and offers guests a view of the mountainous, hilly region to the north. There is no better place in which to forget routine and day to day life. This hotel is located approximately 30 km from Jaipur train station and around 28 km from a bus stop.

This establishment was, in an earlier incarnation, a hunting lodge providing a resting place in the woods for the old rulers of Jaipur. The Maharaja Sawai Madho Singh II ordered its construction towards the end of the 18th century. As guests may guess from the name of the hotel, the building in which the hotel is housed is a centuries old palace, painted with the lime based red dye typical of the region. Nowadays this hotel offers guests air conditioning, a hotel safe, a currency exchange facility, lift access and a hairdresser. The hotel's facilities include, moreover, a nightclub, a casino, a bar, a restaurant, conference facilities and wireless Internet access. Room and laundry services, a car park for those arriving by car and a kids' club for the younger guests are also available.

The air-conditioned rooms are equipped with a hairdryer, satellite/ cable TV, a hi-fi system, a hire safe, a mini fridge, tea and coffee making facilities and an iron and ironing board as standard.

The hotel features indoor and outdoor pools, children's pool, and a sun terrace as well as a hot tub and sports enthusiasts may enjoy a work-out in the gym. Guests are also offered the opportunity to play tennis, squash and golf.
address: JAMWA RAMGARH,,

name: Pratap Bhawan Homestay
description: The name of the hotel is Pratap Bhawan Homestay. The id of the hotel is 64906ae4a3f464b55600bd7a. The hotel star rating is 3. The hotel address is A-4 Pratap Bhawan, Jamanalal Bajaj Marg C scheme, Jaipur, Rajasthan, 302001, India, 302001 Jaipur, Rajasthan, India. Hotel Description is Built in 1980 by Late Brig. Pratap Singh Rathore of Nimaj, which was a fiefdom of the erstwhile state of Jodhpur, Rajasthan, as his residence, Pratap Bhawan invariably had guests, as the family always loved playing host. Owner, Himanshu Rathore inculcated a strong sense of hospitality by his father ever since.He grew up in an environment teeming with passion for wildlife and exploring it. To supplement his passion for wildlife he trained as a naturalist with Taj Safaris at Bandhavgarh National Park and not only carries experience of jungles across India but also South Africa.Photography has always been an extension of his passion for wildlife. The camera only complements his drive for wildlife, which extends an array of experiences and encapsulates them as memories in form of pictures, glimpses of which can be seen all the way down on the walls of Pratap Bhawan.Pratap Bhawan has a distinct style reflecting the owners taste and personality. Himanshu, a naturalist wildlife photographer and wife, Deepti, an avid interior designer, together have designed their home into a luxurious villa that offers three beautifully crafted rooms full of character, all decorated with a theme based on nature and wildlife. Steeped in history the villa is now adorned with contemporary furniture and objects dart.With our roots attached to Jaipur, we know the region, the customs and the local people well and provide you with an unrivalled local concierge service. Our aim is, not only to provide the perfect accommodation, but also to ensure you receive the best service during your stay. If you would like a day in a yoga lesson, a wild life safari, a cultural tour, a fishing trip, a gourmet dinner under the stars or just your favourite brand of cigar, we make everything is possible. Additional Description for the hotel are Immerse in wildlife passion, luxury villa designed with nature-themed rooms.
address: A-4 Pratap Bhawan, Jamanalal Bajaj Marg C scheme, Jaipur, Rajasthan, 302001, India, 302001 Jaipur, Rajasthan, India

Hotel Description is Bharat Mahal Palaceis approximately 11 km from the Jaipur International Airport and 5 km from Jantar Mantar. This 90-year old property has been the residence of a royal family for decades and is now a heritage hotel.The accommodation in Jaipur has 22 opulent guestrooms. Each of the rooms is equipped with an air-conditioner, television, telephone, minibar, tea/coffee maker and attached bathroom. The suites feature an additional living areas and a four-poster bed.The property in Jaipur features an restaurant, business center and banquet facilities. The accommodation is also provided with a 24-hour front desk assistance, room service, laundry/dry cleaning services and wake-up calls on request. The traditional Rajasthani architecture, ethnic interiors and modern amenities have been skilfully blended to provide guests with optimum comfort and luxury.Bharat Mahal Palaceprovides travel assistance to guests to help them plan their day trips. Attractions nearby include the Jal Mahal (14 km), Hawa Mahal (6 km), City Palace (6 km) and Rambagh Palace (3 km). The Jaipur Railway Station and Sain Colony Bus Stop are 2 km away from the hotel in Jaipur. Additional Description for the hotel are Experience the essence of heritage with impeccable service and cuisine.

name: Hotel Grand Maple
description:
The name of the hotel is Hotel Grand Maple. The id of the hotel is 64906ae7a3f464b55600bda5. The hotel star rating is 3. The hotel address is  F 282, 283 EPIP,  Sitapura. Hotel Description is Fusing modern design with elegance, Hotel Grand Maple is a new premier, contemporary luxury boutique hotel in an enviable location, just 10 minutes from Jaipur International Airport, 2 minutes drive from Jaipur Exhibition & Convention Center and 20 minutes drive to heart of the city. It offers a unique getaway with a modern understated decor. Ideal for your weekend breaks, business trips, luxury holidays, it is also a perfect wedding destination. It boasts a cool, trendy atmosphere, world class amenities and dedicated service with a personal touch, for a truly memorable hotel experience. It offers four star standard hotel facilities with quality of banquet and rooms equivalent to a five star hotel.

The hotel features 34 spacious, chic and comfortable rooms, an array of dining options and sophisticated meeting facilities. Gastronomically speaking, Grand Maple serves up a multitude of delicacies, flavors and aromas.

The hotel is optimized for events and offers a large 3,500 sqft banqueting area accompanied by a massive 22,000 sqft lush Party Lawn. From weddings to corporate get-togethers, birthdays and anniversaries, our venue will turn your events into milestones. The hotel is also optimized for differently-abled guests with wheelchair accessible ramp, room and well trained staff.
 Additional Description for the hotel are Contemporary luxury boutique hotel near Jaipur Airport with world-class amenities.

name: Indana Palace Jaipur
description:
The name of the hotel is Indana Palace Jaipur. The id of the hotel is 64906ae8a3f464b55600bdb6. The hotel star rating is 5. The hotel address is Jaipur - Delhi Highway, Amer,, 302028 Jaipur, India, 302028 Jaipur, India. Hotel Description is Indana palace is a magnificent hotel in Jaipur, Rajasthan, through the grand stone entry porch, with its exquisite hand-crafted doorway, you enter another world! A world of the maharajahs and maharanis of yore. Welcome to a royal hospitality experience, one of the best luxury hotels in Jaipur, Rajasthan.
From the outside in, Indana palace is designed to echo the palaces of the erstwhile desert kingdom. The interiors abound with luxurious marble from around the world, and intricate wood and gold-leaf work. All coming together to create a distinctive heritage architecture feel.
This old-world grandeur is complemented with every modern comfort and luxury that a discerning world traveler expects, alongside the best value.
A 5-star hotel with lavish accommodation, rich and varied dining experiences, a signature wedding venue with supporting services, state-of-the-art business facilities, a spa hotel experience, and pampering leisure amenities come together to provide a luxurious home away from home in Jaipur city not too far from the airport.

name: Treebo Trend Utsav Niwas Vidyadhar Nagar
description:
The name of the hotel is Treebo Trend Utsav Niwas Vidyadhar Nagar. The id of the hotel is 64906ae8a3f464b55600bdbe. The hotel star rating is 3. The hotel address is C-89, Shekhawat Marg, Ambabari, Sikar Road Near  , Vidyadhar Nagar, Bani Park, 302023 Jaipur, India, 302023 Jaipur, India. Hotel Description is Treebo Trend Utsav Niwas is a beautiful heritage property located in the quiet neighbourhood of Ambabari, Jaipur. Experience the best of Jaipur by choosing to stay in this property that boasts proximity to transit points and tourist attractions. Further, they have every essential amenities on offer for a comfortable stay while also ensuring safety under Treebo Hygiene Shield, all at budget-friendly prices. It is an ideal stay for all types of guests like families, foreigners, medical tourist, young singles and couples. The hotel is accessible from Jaipur International Airport (17 km) and Jaipur Junction (4.9 km). Treebo Trend Utsav Niwas is an ideal stay for those who do not compromise on quality and the factors that ensure guest satisfaction are free WiFi, delectable complimentary breakfast, private cab facilities and free parking for 6 two-wheelers and 6 four-wheelers. The hotel also has an in-house restaurant that does away with the hassle of looking for a restaurant while providing lip-smacking cuisines. Other on-site amenities that they offer are a cloakroom for storing luggage temporarily, an impeccably furnished lobby, a public washroom, a fully stocked pantry and a travel desk. Their friendly staff responds promptly to room service requests and they also have 24x7 security for added safety. It is a couple-friendly property while they also accept Amex and wallet payments. Treebo Trend Utsav Niwas has a total of 15 spacious rooms categorised into Oak (Standard) and Maple (Deluxe). These well-maintained rooms are gorgeously furnished and equipped with all the modern amenities. For instance, each room has comfortable beds, a wardrobe, a study table/chair and a coffee table. Additionally, there is a smoking room while the windows in each provide ample ventilation. Other amenities they are equipped with are an intercom facility, T.V, A.C, fan room lock, heater, hot water and complimentary Treebo toiletries. With plenty of historical sightseeing to do, Treebo Trend Utsav Niwas provides guests with ease of access to them. It includes Jal Mahal (11.2 km), Tal Katora Lake (6.7 km), Vidyadhar Bagh (11.1 km), Sawai Man Singh Town Hall (6.5 km), Amber Palace (14.2 km), City Palace, Jaipur (6.2 km) and Akshardham Temple (8.1 km). Culinary delights of every kind can be tasted in Khandelwal Dhaba (5.7km), Sweet Chilli Restaurant (400 m) and Rasoi Restaurant (1.9 km) which are close by while an awesome shopping experience can be had at Arya Square Shopping Mall (2.6 km), City Mall (6.3 km) and Crystal Mall (4.8 km). description: The name of the hotel is Kanchan Kesari Village Resort. The id of the hotel is 64906ae8a3f464b55600bdc5. The hotel star rating is 3. Hotel Description is <b>Providing you the best of comforts in a charming ambience</b><br><br>Kanchan Kesari Village Resort on the Jaipur-Ajmer highway is a village-based theme resort. With its lush green surroundings and landscaped gardens, the resort offers a place to relax, unwind and experience the warm hospitality. It is located 6 km from Keriya Pink City, and 13 km from World Trade Park.<br><br><b>Saavaj Resorts are located at a distance of 3.5 km from Hiraneshwar temple while the famous Bhounath temple is 4 km away. The distance from Saavaj Resort to Quarashi Bagh and the Sasan Gir Bus stand is 4 km. The nearest airport is Diu Airport, which is 59.5 km from Saavaj Resort.<br><br>Kanchan Kesari Village Resort offers a pool surrounding the hut shaped rooms. The resort offers multiple indoor and outdoor games, activities and cultural shows highlighting the life of a regular Rajasthani Village. Free parking facility is offered to all guests. Kanchan Kesari Village Resort has 20 guest rooms.<br><br>Kanchan Kesari Village Resort offers the option for guests to choose from amid poolside facing rooms and normal rooms. There is no TV in the rooms for the resort plans outdoors recreational activities including Rajasthani Folklore at the village section. Room service and laundry service are available. Airport transportation service is available on request.<br><br>The resort offers an in-housetaurant named Jeeman serving traditional Rajasthani Food along with popular North Indian cuisine for its guests. The restaurant offers both unlimited thali and a-la-carte option.<br><br><b>What people love the most about this property is its welcoming ambience and great location<br><br>Book now and enjoy the warm hospitality of Kanchan Kesari Village Resort! Additional Description for the hotel are Experience the charm of a Rajasthani village with lush green surroundings.

It is an elegant 3-star property that offers 16 exquisite rooms with elegant decor and cozy furniture. Other amenities include elevators connecting all floors, third-party laundry service, ironing boards for use, well-furnished lobby and a fully-stocked pantry for a quick bite. The hotel also offers private cabs for hire. Complimentary buffet breakfast comprising North and South Indian dishes is offered at the restaurant every morning. The heritage hotel offers a luxury stay amidst the Aravalli Mountains. It is located 41 km from City Palace and 48 km from Jal Mahal. Free wireless connectivity is available in public areas.<br>The hotel features an outdoor swimming pool, a fully-equipped fitness centre, a health spa and a sauna. Each spacious suite is well-equipped with modern amenities like air-conditioning system, TV, mini-bar and tea/coffee maker. They have attached bathrooms with luxury toiletries. Royal Suites have a private courtyard, iPod docks, Lavazza coffee machines, Jacuzzi and a fireplace. Laundry and dry cleaning facilities are also available.<br>There are two restaurants at the hotel that serve traditional Rajasthani, Indian and international cuisine. Hotel Description is Jaipur, sometimes nicknamed the Pink City, is Rajasthan's capital. Jaipur comprises the Golden Triangle with Delhi and Agra, one of India's most popular tourist circuits. Rajputs in the 17th century AD planned Jaipur. Jaipur, the pink city, preserves its old-world beauty with pink walls and gates covered with artwork. Amer Fort and Jantar Mantar are UNESCO World Heritage sites in Jaipur, which also have several forts, palaces, temples, museums, and lively bazaars. Ghewar, Pyaaz Kachori, and Dal Baati Churma are famous local delicacies. The city also hosts the largest literary event in Asia, the Jaipur Literary Festival. Treebo Trend Hotel Airport View is an elegant hotel located in the Jaipur International Airport locality of Jaipur. This budget-friendly popular hotel offers a variety of amenities and follows Treebo Hygiene Shield safety standards. Treebo Trend Hotel Airport View is situated in a good location. The nearest transit points are Durgapura Bus Stand (4.60 km) and Durgapura railway station (5.60 km). The nearest airport is Jaipur International Airport (5.30 km). The property can be easily located through landmarks such as Jaipur Airport Cargo Terminal (1.00 km) and Subodh Girls College (1.60 km). Treebo Trend Hotel Airport View offers its visitors excellent amenities and services to ensure a pleasant stay. The hotel offers an elevator facility with 4 floors of connectivity along with Banquet halls, security, Iron boards, and third-party laundry services. This property's lobby is exquisitely equipped with an air conditioner, beautiful furniture, cloakroom, public washroom, pantry, restaurant, rooftop café, and room service. The property is also disabled-friendly. The guests can relax at the spa offered by the property. During their stay, guests will also receive a complimentary breakfast in the dining area. The property offers spacious outdoor parking for 10 two-wheelers and 5 four-wheelers. Wallet payments are accepted at the hotel. Treebo Trend Hotel Airport View offers some of the best in-room amenities common to all rooms with complimentary Treebo toiletries. The complimentary services include breakfast, 24*7 room service, and branded Treebo toiletries. The hotel has a total inventory of 50 rooms spread across 4 floors. There are 19 Acacia, 25 Oak and 6 Maple. ll the 25 rooms are Oak rooms.
 Additional Description for the hotel are Stay at Treebo Trend Airport View for an elegant and budget-friendly stay in Jaipur.
