name: Shahpura Bagh
description: The name of the hotel is Shahpura Bagh. The id of the hotel is 649075624a9510a9c20d65ad. The hotel star rating is 4. The hotel address is Shahpura Bagh Road , 311404 Shāhpura, India, 311404, India. Hotel Description is <b> Look beyond the beaten track amid the golden sands of Rajasthan and you will glimpse an oasis - A dazzling shimmer of sunshine on water that hovers on the edge of a mirage. Drive on. This is timeless Rajasthan - untouched by the creeping fingers of modernity - unchanged in its unpretentious natural grandeur. In  the early 1900s, Rajadhiraj Nahar Singh of Shahpura mortgaged the familys private property and jewels to bring water to his people. Today, the lakes he created, form the heart of a verdant wetland refuge - historic, picturesque, tranquil - an idyllic setting where man and nature have come to understand each other. Situated midway (4hrs drive, 220 Km from both) between Jaipur and Udaipur and easily accessible from hotels in Udaipur, Ranthambore   and Jodhpur, Shahpura Bagh is  the residence of the rulers of Shahpura. Travelers, since time immemorial, have always stopped to rest and refresh themselves at this oasis and the Shahpura family is famous for their warmth and hospitality. Shahpura bagh prides itself on providing an authentic bespoke home stay experience in Rajasthan. Life is unhurried here. The days filled with sunshine, conversation and picnics, fishing and boating on the lakes with lazy sundownners to trap the blazing sunset. Spontaneous excursions trace the history of the region through neighbouring forts and legends, rambles transform into safaris in the flash of a beckoning wing -the surrounding wetlands are a birdwatcher's paradise, tempting even to the uninitiated. Shahpura Bagh is one of the predominant luxury hotels of Rajasthan, a place where you can rest, refresh, and revive yourself. A destination you can come home to...</B> Additional Description for the hotel are Tranquil oasis in Rajasthan, offering authentic bespoke home stay experience.
address: Shahpura Bagh Road , 311404 Shāhpura, India, 311404, India

Jawahar Circle, a big and lush green park is just 3 minutes walk away where you can take long refreshing walks in the morning or can enjoy the musical water fountain show in the evening.  Thus we are ideally located for a tourist or a business traveller. As we are strategically and centrally located, we offer easy access to preferred destinations ranging from airport, railway station, and bus station to the citys best shopping malls, restaurants, hotels, hospitals of international repute, Universities  colleges and the walled city of Jaipur. While you live in a modern and sophisticated portion of the city, as a tourist you can reach the walled city of Jaipur in not more than 15 minutes. So you are not far from home even at late evening shopping sprees.  The guest house makes sure that while you are away from your home, there is nothing that you would miss... Hotel Description is The hotel is located at the heart of Jaipur, the Pink City. The nearest railway station is just 1 km away, while the airport can be found about 12 km away from the hotel.The air-conditioned hotel features elegant exteriors, with a huge garden in front that provides guests with a sense of peace. Guests are welcomed in the lobby, which radiates the same ambience, with elegant interiors and furnishing. The lobby also offers a 24-hour reception and a 24-hour check-out service, as well as a hotel safe, currency exchange facilities and a cloakroom. Facilities on offer to guests include a newspaper stand. Guests can enjoy a drink at the bar, and dine in the restaurant. Conference facilities are available to business travellers. Guests can also take advantage of the room and laundry services. Those arriving by car may leave their vehicles in the hotel car park. The hotel's luxurious accommodation units and excellent services make it the perfect place to stay for both leisure and business travellers.The hotel provides a range of rooms belonging to the Executive, Deluxe and Studio categories. The rooms are elegantly furnished and offer a warm ambience, with mint, peach, beige or blue tones in each of the colour-coded rooms. The hotel rooms are well equipped. All rooms come with a modern, luxurious en suite bathroom with a shower/bath. Guests can enjoy a good night's rest on their comfortable double bed. Rooms also come equipped with a direct dial telephone, electronic safe and a minibar. Standard in-room amenities include satellite/cable TV and Internet access. Furthermore, tea and coffee making facilities and air conditioning are provided in all accommodation as standard. Disclaimer notification: Amenities are subject to availability and may be chargeable as per the hotel policy.
